item.title: Re-reading excercise articles compilation
item.description:
In this post, I’ve compiled a list of articles I use for my re-reading exerciseâ€”articles intentionally difficult to read, often filled with jargon, HR-related topics, and dense regulations. The goal is to build focus and patience by revisiting these challenging reads. Here are some examples:
